articles.title: ‘Hemingway’ Review: Ken Burns’ Exhaustive Look at the Archetype of the White Male Western Canon - IndieWire
articles.description: PBS offers up a comprehensive six hours on the life and loves of Ernest Hemingway.
articles.content: Ernest Hemingway means different things to different people. To some, he’s little more than a name on a required reading list in school, one of those white males whose work makes up the canon of West… [+4901 chars]
